review: Easy set up and perfect function.
author: Kevin

review: Installs quick and easy.  No problems. Smooth, no hic-up-ing, no buffering.  Plenty to watch -- shows all amazon prime and more.  Works with netflix if that's not enough for you.  Saving lots of money by cutting cable tv and using this with my cable internet signal and free over the air local stations.
author: James Johnston

review: Own Chromecast, WD TV Live Plus, Roku 3, but this is my favorite!
author: Robert

review: This is extremely easy to install and works perfectly. One word of advice check to see how many HDMI ports you have available on your T.V. If need be buy a pigtail splitter they have one on amazon that automatically detects which thing you are using (such as blue ray player or Firestick) so you do not have to manually change it!!
author: Daniel

review: Great for streaming Netflix. Needs more available apps.
author: MsFliKix

review: Awesome. Love it. Waiting on another.
author: Pamela Birkhimer

review: Works better than I expected..  Easy to install and use.  Picture and sound are good.  Best of the dongles I have encountered so far and the least expensive.
author: Jack Rosenberg "Doctor Taz"
